description: This file serves as the entry point for the Vite preview environment in a Qwik project. It sets up the QwikCity middleware for server-side rendering, importing the necessary plan and render functions, and exports a configured QwikCity instance.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates and configures the QwikCity middleware for the Vite preview setup, integrating the server-side render function and the Qwik City plan.
